questionTitle: He had to leave his family ________ when he went abroad to work.
The author had qualified as a doctor but later gave up the ________ of medicine for full-time writing.
It was ________ we had to walk quickly to keep warm.
His first novel was much more exciting ________ any he has written since.
Oh, I forgot to tell you. I am having a party on Friday - ________?
He ________ his head, wondering how he could solve the problem.
He swatted a fly on the window and ________ the glass.
Jean received a letter this morning ________ her a place at university.
They've spent so much money that they're ________ debt.
Will you please ________ what you just said. It was very rude.
Stick this ________ on the parcel that says 'Fragile'. Then people will see that they must handle it carefully.
He ________ that the people he works with are all very interested in their jobs.
The trade ________ of the company is a flying horse.
You will not succeed ________ working harder.
She'll never part ________ her precious possessions.
I am grateful ________ you for being so patient with him.
We have to work hard for our money while the fat ________ in the City make money doing very little.
Youngsters need all the help and ________ they can get nowadays when applying for jobs.
